sentences.en: A large area and in serious cases must rework roller.
sentences.cn: 大面积,严重的情况下必须返修辊筒.

sentences.en: Any reworked non - conforming products must go through the re - inspection processes after rework.
sentences.cn: 任何返工后的不合格品均须重新检查.

sentences.en: Coach supplier for fixture and gage rework, fabrication, assembly , and inspection process.
sentences.cn: 能够设计夹具、具和其他工具制造所必需的的产品工程图.

sentences.en: Does the rework instruction comply with Synaptics Spec and IPC specification?
sentences.cn: 重工指导书是否符合synaptics规格与IPC规范?

sentences.en: For rework fee in poor quality cost analysis was not conducted.
sentences.cn: 质量成本中关于返工费用统计方法不准确.

sentences.en: I decided to scribble out the messed up areas and rework them.
sentences.cn: 我决定涂掉那些一团糟的地方,去重画.

sentences.en: If done properly, RE can help in reducing requirement changes and rework.
sentences.cn: 如果做的好, 会减少需求变更和返工.

sentences.en: In most instances, these repairs involve rework of the base metal.
sentences.cn: 多数情况下, 都要翻修本体金属.

sentences.en: Is rework performed for ENIG? If so , what type of rework?
sentences.cn: 化镍金是否可以重工? 若可以, 是如何重工?

sentences.en: Is there a documented allowable rework procedure with appropriate quality checks?
sentences.cn: 是否有文件规定允许的重工程序和相应的品质检验?

sentences.en: Perform troubleshooting, modification and repair work, and undertake hand rework tasks.
sentences.cn: 执行排故, 改装,修理工作及承担手工技能工作.

sentences.en: Record the actual rework effort on the Inspection Summary Report.
sentences.cn: 在评审总结报告上纪录实际的返工工作量.

sentences.en: Repair and rework on Transceiver Module assembly and related PCBA.
sentences.cn: 维修和返工光收发器模块组件,和相关的PCBA板.

sentences.en: See if you can rework your schedule and come up with practical ways to reduce the number of hours you're on call.
sentences.cn: 看看你能否修改你的时间表，想出切实可行的方法来减少你待命的时间。

sentences.en: Time to rework your accessories and makeover your shelves.
sentences.cn: 也是重新整理各种小装饰品和抽屉的时候了.

sentences.en: Unlike rework, repair can affect or change parts of the nonconforming product.
sentences.cn: 返修与返工不同, 返修可影响或改变不合格产品的某些部分.

trans.tran_en: If you rework something such as an idea or a piece of writing, you reorganize it and make changes to it in order to improve it or bring it up to date
If you rework something such as an idea or a piece of writing, you reorganize it and make changes to it in order to improve it or bring it up to date
